entity.name: name_instance
entity.query: SELECT nr_num || '-' || choice_number AS id, name_instance_id, choice_number, corp_num, name, nr_num, request_id, submit_count, request_type_cd, name_id, start_event_id, name_state_type_cd FROM bc_registries_names.completed_nr_vw WHERE request_id IS NOT NULL
